descriptionHtml:
this mod will allow you to conjure a skeletal dragon Enjoy !!
The Hard Roleplay version located to the left of the area (next to where one of the skeletons spawn) where you fight the skeleton Dragon
The Easy version file: spell tome is located in labyrinthian exterior in the area where the wooden mask is located beside the skeleton.
you have to conjure it in a wide open area because the dragon is large and cant be conjured in small areas or indoors.
author: zanger1234

files.name: Conjure a Skeletal Dragon Easy version
Conjure Skeletal Dragon Hard Roleplay version
files.fileName: Conjure Skeletal Dragon Hard Roleplay version-53496-1-1.zip
files.changelogHtml:
For the hard version
Better place for the book
Have to be doing the College of Winterhold Quest
Better and more rewarding for getting the Tome
